Chris Bryant, who believes he may have been a victim of the phone hackers, said Friday he welcomed the decision to re-examine the case, adding that it should not have been closed last month. The evidence that this goes far deeper than one rotten apple has continued to stack up, and so a fresh pair of eyes looking at the case is very welcome, he said. Bryant said the police had`` severely'' damaged their credibility by failing to properly investigate earlier. Andy Coulson and the News of The World have denied the charges. Sea Gals

Don't count Mayor Tom Leppert among the`` great majority'' of people clamoring to give Michael Vick the civic honor usually reserved for meritorious citizenship: `` The action taken was not sanctioned by my office and was not an official ceremonial honor on behalf of the City of Dallas. Official Keys to the City are presented by the Mayor Tom Leppert , or an elected official designated by the Mayor Tom Leppert , and reserved, on a limited basis, for an elected official of international status. Clearly, this was not the case in this situation and done without my knowledge or approval.
